Package com.mygdx.game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CollisionObserver
    Interface to print upon collision
    CollisionSubject
    Interface to add and remove CollisionObserver layers and print the colliding object (upon observed collisions)
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseLevel
    BaseLevel class which includes all instance variables and methods which are common in each level(many of these methods are overwritten)
    Button
    This class includes the methods and variables common to all button interactable objects (primarily used to open and close doors but also used to set levels)
    Character
    This class supports specific features of a character and also observes its collisions
    Door
    This class represents the door allowing a door object to be instanced and allows its state of being opened or closed to be changed by other objects.
    Enemy
    This class represents the chasing enemy hindering the characters by depleting their health
    Entity
    This class includes variables and methods to support the movement of relevant levelObjects
    ExitPlate
    This class represents the exit plate which the character interacts with upon completion of the current level
    Floor
    Class for floor tiles including setting each flor tiles position and image
    FloorGas
    Represents the gas in place of usual tiles in the map
    Gas
    This class represents the gas trailing behind the enemy's recent path
    GasMask
    This class is representative of a gas mask object that the character picks up to avoid damage from gas
    HealthBar
    This class represents the health bar above the character which changes position as the character moves and changes image as health depletes
    HealthPotion
    This class is representative of a health potion object that the character picks up to increase health
    Interactable
    This class represents an interactable which is primarily used for the doors and door openers in the game
    InvincibilityPotion
    This class is representative of an invincibility potion object that the character picks up to avoid taking damage
    Item
    This abstract class represents floor items which assists players in the game including potions and gas masks.
    Level3
    This class represents the third level.
    LevelFour
    This class represents the third level.
    LevelObject
    A LevelObject class which is a Super class to all tile and item objects.
    LevelOne
    This class represents the first level.
    LevelTwo
    This class represents the second level.
    Lever
    Class representing a lever object used to open/close doors
    MainMenu
    This class represents the menu screen.
    MyGdxGame
    This launches the game by creating the appropriate level/screen
    PressurePlate
    This class includes all the variables and methods of a pressure plate which is used to open/close doors depending on whether a character is standing on it or not
    SmallGap
    This class represents small gaps in the maps that characters can only pass after drinking small potion items
    SmallPotion
    This class is representative of a health potion object that the character picks up to turn small and fit in small gaps
    SpeedPotion
    This class is representative of a speed potion object that the character picks up to increase speed
    Tile
    This class represents a tile.
    TileMap
    This class represents our tile map representative of each part of the screen
    Wall
    This class essentially allows new walls to be created, added to appropriate lists and drawn
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MyGdxGame.levels
